definition: characteristic of the provinces or their people, a country person
details:
adjective
- characteristic of the provinces or their people
= example: characteristic of the provinces or their people
- of or associated with a province
= example: of or associated with a province
noun
- a country person
= synonyms: bucolic, peasant
- (Roman Catholic Church) an official in charge of an ecclesiastical province acting under the superior general of a religious order
= example: (Roman Catholic Church) an official in charge of an ecclesiastical province acting under the superior general of a religious order
